preCopyScript.value:
if   object_id('@{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}') is not null  
  truncate table @{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}

activities.name: delete_2days
activities.description: 由于时间戳数仓中的类型为date 类型,由于执行时间为12点，所以删除前一天的一天

text.value: delete from @{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME} where rowversion >=  CONVERT(date, dateadd(hh,-32,GETDATE()))

MERGE.defaultValue: DELETE     FROM [CK].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB]     WHERE EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1                  FROM [CKSTG].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB]                  WHERE [CKSTG].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[ORDER_NO] = [CK].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[ORDER_NO]                  AND   [CKSTG].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_NO] = [CK].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[LINE_NO]                  AND   [CKSTG].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[RELEASE_NO] = [CK].[PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB].[RELEASE_NO]                  )

STGSQL.defaultValue: select        REPLACE(order_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          order_no,        REPLACE(line_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           line_no,        REPLACE(release_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')        release_no,        REPLACE(process_type, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      process_type,        REPLACE(blanket_order, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     blanket_order,        blanket_line ,        REPLACE(buyer_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           buyer_code,        REPLACE(buy_unit_meas, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')        buy_unit_meas,        REPLACE(contract, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')             contract,        REPLACE(currency_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')        currency_code,        REPLACE(demand_operation_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')  demand_operation_no,        REPLACE(demand_order_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')    demand_order_code,        REPLACE(demand_order_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      demand_order_no,        REPLACE(demand_order_type, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')    demand_order_type,        REPLACE(demand_release, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       demand_release,        REPLACE(demand_sequence_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   demand_sequence_no,        REPLACE(eng_chg_level, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')        eng_chg_level,        REPLACE(inspection_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      inspection_code,        note_id ,        REPLACE(order_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       order_code,        REPLACE(part_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          part_no,        REPLACE(qc_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          qc_code,        REPLACE(requisition_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   requisition_no,        pre_accounting_id ,        REPLACE(req_line, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          req_line,        REPLACE(price_unit_meas, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   price_unit_meas,        REPLACE(req_release, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       req_release,        REPLACE(unit_meas, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         unit_meas,        buy_qty_due ,        buy_unit_price ,        REPLACE(close_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   close_code,        close_tolerance ,        additional_cost_amount ,        conv_factor ,        currency_rate ,        TO_CHAR(date_entered, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')           date_entered,        REPLACE(delivery_control_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   delivery_control_code,        REPLACE(demand_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')             demand_code,        REPLACE(description, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')             description,        discount ,        fbuy_unit_price ,        REPLACE(hide_price , CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   hide_price ,        TO_CHAR(last_activity_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')           last_activity_date ,        original_qty ,        TO_CHAR(planned_delivery_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')         planned_delivery_date ,        TO_CHAR(planned_receipt_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          planned_receipt_date ,        REPLACE(note_text , CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   note_text ,        TO_CHAR(promised_delivery_date  , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          promised_delivery_date ,        price_conv_factor,        qty_on_order ,        revised_qty ,        sample_percent ,        sample_qty ,        REPLACE(stat_grp, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')             stat_grp,        TO_CHAR(wanted_delivery_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          wanted_delivery_date,        TO_CHAR(last_ord_conf_reminder, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')        last_ord_conf_reminder,        TO_CHAR(last_delivery_reminder, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')        last_delivery_reminder,        ord_conf_rem_num ,        delivery_rem_num ,        REPLACE(ord_conf_reminder, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      ord_conf_reminder,        REPLACE(delivery_reminder, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      delivery_reminder,        REPLACE(replaces_order_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      replaces_order_no,        REPLACE(replaces_line_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       replaces_line_no,        REPLACE(replaces_release_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')    replaces_release_no,        replaces_receipt_no ,        REPLACE(rowstate, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')               rowstate,        REPLACE(rowtype, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                rowtype,        REPLACE(receive_case, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           receive_case,        REPLACE(part_ownership, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         part_ownership,        REPLACE(purchase_payment_type, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')  purchase_payment_type,        activity_seq ,        REPLACE(automatic_invoice, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   automatic_invoice,        REPLACE(project_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          project_id,        REPLACE(manufacturer_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     manufacturer_id,        REPLACE(delivery_flag, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       delivery_flag,        REPLACE(part_revision, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       part_revision,        REPLACE(currency_type, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       currency_type,        REPLACE(assortment, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          assortment,        standard_order_qty ,        despatch_qty ,        TO_CHAR(despatch_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          despatch_date,        REPLACE(delnote_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                 delnote_no,        REPLACE(technical_coordinator_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   technical_coordinator_id,        REPLACE(configuration_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           configuration_id,        REPLACE(job_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                     job_id,        warranty_id ,        REPLACE(manufacturer_part_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      manufacturer_part_no,        REPLACE(purchase_modified, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         purchase_modified,        REPLACE(outside_operation_notes, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   outside_operation_notes,        REPLACE(taxable, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                   taxable,        REPLACE(tax_exempt, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                tax_exempt,        tax_amount ,        REPLACE(tax_ship_address, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     tax_ship_address,        REPLACE(condition_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       condition_code,        REPLACE(service_type, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         service_type,        REPLACE(lot_batch_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         lot_batch_no,        REPLACE(is_exchange_part, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     is_exchange_part,        REPLACE(serial_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')            serial_no,        REPLACE(original_part_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     original_part_no,        REPLACE(defect_part_key_ref, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')  defect_part_key_ref,        REPLACE(owning_customer_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')   owning_customer_no,        REPLACE(purch_ship_back, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      purch_ship_back,        core_deposit ,        core_deposit_base ,        REPLACE(exchange_item , CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         exchange_item ,        qty_scrapped_supplier ,        REPLACE(destination_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     destination_id,        REPLACE(ship_via_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      ship_via_code,        REPLACE(delivery_terms, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     delivery_terms,        REPLACE(address_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         address_id,        REPLACE(addr_flag, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          addr_flag,        REPLACE(default_addr_flag, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')  default_addr_flag,        REPLACE(company, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')            company,        REPLACE(forwarder_id, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       forwarder_id,        REPLACE(pay_tax, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')            pay_tax,        REPLACE(internal_dest_desc, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '') internal_dest_desc,        REPLACE(purchase_site, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      purchase_site,        REPLACE(freeze_flag, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')        freeze_flag,        REPLACE(cancel_reason, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      cancel_reason,        TO_CHAR(rowversion, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          rowversion,        REPLACE(ship_via_desc, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')                  ship_via_desc,        REPLACE(delivery_terms_desc, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')            delivery_terms_desc,        fbuy_tax_unit_price ,        REPLACE(def_vat_code, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')               def_vat_code,        REPLACE(n_temp_price_flg, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           n_temp_price_flg,        REPLACE(n_zero_price_flg, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')           n_zero_price_flg,        TO_CHAR( n_due_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')           n_due_date ,        REPLACE(n_syo_kyaku_state, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     n_syo_kyaku_state,        REPLACE(n_die_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')              n_die_no,        n_price_before_div ,        n_syo_kyaku_qty ,        REPLACE(webedi_shipped_status, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '') webedi_shipped_status,        REPLACE(webedi_invoice_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     webedi_invoice_no,        REPLACE(webedi_split_po, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')       webedi_split_po,        REPLACE(webedi_source_po, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')      webedi_source_po,        TO_CHAR( webedi_pick_lst_p_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')       webedi_pick_lst_p_date ,        TO_CHAR( webedi_label_p_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')          webedi_label_p_date ,        webedi_total_print_count ,        webedi_print_count ,        REPLACE(ckm_order_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          ckm_order_no,        REPLACE(ckm_delivery_time, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')     ckm_delivery_time,        REPLACE(co_line_info, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')          co_line_info,        REPLACE(c_cust_rel_no, CHR(13) || CHR (10), '')         c_cust_rel_no  from IFSAPP.PURCHASE_ORDER_LINE_TAB where TO_CHAR(rowversion, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') >
